abstract: The latest installment in the racing simulator series benefits from a powerful lighting engine and the presence of the cantankerous "Top Gear" host, Jeremy Clarkson.
snippet: The latest installment in the racing simulator series benefits from a powerful lighting engine and the presence of the cantankerous "Top Gear" host, Jeremy Clarkson.

headline.main: Forza 4 Doubles Down on Cars, Graphics and Clarkson
